casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Barfield BOWIE. No. 50A93-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 17, 2008. Jill Ledford Cheek, Special Deputy Attorney General, James C. Gaither, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of January 2008 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (William Barfield Bowie) shall have up to and including the 2nd day of June 2008 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of January 2008."
